creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018
text: This study of a family is an early work in the career of Daniel Chodowiecki. Like many artists throughout Europe in the 1700s, he picked up on the practice of Dutch artists from the prior century—most notably Rembrandt—who made small sketch-like etchings of people they saw in the streets. Chodowiecki’s mature work took a different turn as he lavished care on his etchings, filling them with elaborate detail and atmospheric lighting.
title: Woman with a child on her back and two more walking with her
